name: Desecration
description:
Imprisoned on a derelict starship, you are awakened to find that a deadly pathogen has been released on board. Following the instructions of a mysterious overseer, you must make your way through the ship, to discover the fate of the crew and other convicts, and ultimately, escape. But beware; the result of the pathogen may be hunting you down...

(Originally uploaded as part of the May 2020 Haunted Hunting Game Jam)

Thanks so much for checking out our game! We hope you liked it. While only a demo at the moment, we are hoping to polish and expand the game, and eventually release a full-length version. Thank you so much for supporting us, please consider following us on Twitter at DarkDeerGames, for semi-regular updates.
